sourcesContent:
import React, { FC, memo } from 'react'; const Experience: FC = () => { return (

Experience

Software Developer

2019 - Present

Eyas Gaming

Actively contributed to the development and maintenance of two major projects: an interactive online casino platform and a dynamic football online betting platform. Utilized modern web development frameworks and libraries such as React and Redux to build responsive and user-friendly interfaces, ensuring optimal user experience.

Collaborated with a team of developers using Microsoft Azure for source control, ensuring smooth version control and code integration. Regularly participated in agile development cycles, using Jira for task tracking, sprint planning, and bug tracking. Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams, including designers, backend developers, and product managers, to deliver high-quality features on time.

In our project, we utilize AEM to oversee multiple casino brands. Through AEM, we not only configure site settings for each brand and page but also manage templates, components, and workflows to ensure consistent content delivery. The Digital Asset Management (DAM) system in AEM helps us centralize and manage media assets effectively. We also make use of AEM's personalization features to tailor user experiences based on audience segments. With the integration of the CRX manager, I ensure seamless data synchronization between the development and production environments, ensuring a smooth content deployment process.

); }; export default memo(Experience);
